Schritte International 2 Lehrerhandbuch is a great resource for both teachers and learners of German. It covers topics such as family, hobbies, shopping, travel, and culture. It also introduces grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation in a clear and easy way. The book has a lot of illustrations, photos, and dialogues that make learning German fun and engaging. The book also comes with an audio CD that contains listening exercises and songs.
